LanguageData.Elephant.label: elephant
LanguageData.Elephant.description: The largest unmodified land animal. It can use its tusks as tools for moving objects - or as deadly weapons.
LanguageData.Elephant_Leather.label: elephant skin
LanguageData.Elephant_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a elephant.
LanguageData.Elephant_Meat.label: elephant meat
LanguageData.Elephant_Corpse.label: elephant corpse
LanguageData.Elephant.label: elephant
LanguageData.Elephant.lifeStages.0.label: elephant calf
LanguageData.Megatherium.label: megatherium
LanguageData.Megatherium.description: A type of ground sloth, megatheria are giant, solitary herbivores. Long extinct after being wiped out by the natives of Earth's America continent, the ground sloth was later brought back using advanced cloning and artificial gestators.
LanguageData.Megatherium_Leather.label: megatherium leather
LanguageData.Megatherium_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a megatherium.
LanguageData.Megatherium_Meat.label: megatherium meat
LanguageData.Megatherium_Corpse.label: megatherium corpse
LanguageData.Megatherium.label: megatherium
LanguageData.Thrumbo.label: thrumbo
LanguageData.Thrumbo.description: A gigantic creature of unknown origin. The thrumbo is gentle by nature, but extremely dangerous when enraged. Its long fur is exceptionally beautiful and valuable, and its razor-sharp horn is very valuable in most markets. Legends say that an old thrumbo is the wisest creature in the universe - it simply chooses not to speak.
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Leather.label: thrumbofur
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Leather.description: Leather made from the skin of a thrumbo.
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Meat.label: thrumbo meat
LanguageData.Thrumbo_Corpse.label: thrumbo corpse
LanguageData.Thrumbo.label: thrumbo
LanguageData.Thrumbo.lifeStages.0.label: thrumbo calf
